p: Ciprofloxacin, gentamicin, cefoxitin, amphotericin B, and ethambutol (Sigma-Aldrich, St. Louis, MO, USA) were used as reference standards. Stock solutions were prepared according to the manufacturer’s instructions. Final twofold dilutions from 16 to 0.004 μg/mL were prepared in broth suitable for given microbial.
